trends: There has been one other sighting in Kuna
There were no other sightings in Kuna on or around August 13th 2003
Summary: blue non blinking light moving, turns to triangle,
divs: Sighting DetailsDriving in car outside small town at late night. Full moon and house lightsonly. Saw light blue non blinking light and faint white light seemingly attachedtogether moved across sky about 3 inches may have arched as it went, perhapsjust movement from driving suddenly angled downward at about 50 degrees andchanged into a triangle of white lights about penny sized with fourth lightclose to lower corner and went very quickly below tree level. May have been anengine noise not like prop plane or like turbine after I got out of my car. Butby then it was gone.
